bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XXXIV (Nos 2683-2732)

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: Ingrams L., P. Kingston, P. Parsons and J. Rea, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XXXIV (Nos 2683-2732). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 49.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1968, 8°, xii-162 pp. et VIII pll.

C.R. par Zbigniew Borkowski, JJurP 18 (1974) pp. 259-263. - LLoyd W. Daly, AJP 92 (1971) pp. 499-502. - Dario Del Corno, Gnomon 45 (1973) pp. 540-546 - Paul Mertens, BibO 27 (1970) pp. 353-355. - Ors. Montevecchi, Aegyptus 48 (1968) pp. 252-256 (concerne aussi les volumes XXXII et XXXV). - Jose O'Callaghan, StPap 9 (1970) pp. 70-71. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 44 (1969) No. 88, pp. 360-366. - J. David Thomas, CR N.S., 20 (1970) pp. 392-393. - Francis Vian, REG 82 (1969) pp. 229-232. - Hans Julius Wolff, ZSav 87 (1970) pp. 480-486 (concerne aussi P. Oxy. XXXIII).
